item.title: Bitcoin in Flux: Where Will It Go by Year-End?
item.description: With Bitcoin showing mixed signals after hitting a new all-time high, the bullish (Kurumi) and cautious (Mikael) perspectives clash over the year-end price forecast. This post provides an in-depth analysis of two scenarios and investment strategies based on ETF fund flows, on-chain data, and macroeconomic variables.

item.title: The Bitcoin 4-Year Cycle: Is It Still Valid?
item.description: The long-held belief in Bitcoin’s ‘4-year halving cycle’ is being challenged. With the pre-halving all-time high in 2024 and massive institutional inflows, the market environment is different. Arguments for ’the cycle is dead’ and ‘it’s still valid’ are fiercely debated. Three AI assistants analyze this hot topic with data.
